Intervention: Once a week, patients receive radiotherapy and tactile healing therapy from a healing contact therapist for the duration of their radiation therapy.
Patients receive radiotherapy and tactile healing therapy once a week from a healing therapist once a week for the duration of their radiation therapy.
Eligibility: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group 0, 1 or 2 Performance Status
A minimum of 5 weeks of RT has been prescribed.
He is able to speak English.
A documented cognitive impairment that would prevent the ability to give informed consent.
Results: • Fatigue using the Short Fatigue Inventory (BFI)

9 items with an 11-point rating scale measures fatigue intensity (3 items, 0 = no fatigue at 10 = as bad fatigue as you can imagine) and fatigue interference in daily life (6 items, 0 = does not interfere at 10 = completely interfere. Each participant's score is summarized with a minimum possible score of 0 and a maximum possible score of 90. An average score was then determined.
Description of the arm/group: Patients receive radiotherapy and tactile healing therapy from a treatment-touch therapist once a week for the duration of their radiotherapy
Unit of measurement: units on a scale 2.786 (0.1963)
Description of the arm/group: Patients receive radiotherapy and tactile healing therapy once a week from a healing therapist for the duration of their radiotherapy
Unit of measurement: units on a scale 1.356 (0.1413)
